about_the_game:
Medieval StartUp is a unique experience blending tavern management, crafting, exploration, and an immersive medieval atmosphere. As the owner of a small tavern nestled in a mysterious swamp, you must balance business development, resource management, and customer satisfaction to thrive.

Core Gameplay

  • Tavern Management: Take charge of every aspect of your establishment, from serving customers to managing stock and staff. Recruit skilled artisans to optimize your productivity.

  • Crafting and Production: Turn collected or traded resources into furniture, dishes, and drinks. Unlock new professions like baking, blacksmithing, or farming.

  • Exploration: Venture into the swamp to gather rare resources, uncover its secrets, and dive into a story rich with hidden mysteries.

Included Content

  • Hours of Captivating Gameplay: A main campaign featuring varied and engaging activities.

  • Diverse Activities:

    • Manage your finances, hire staff, and improve your tavern.

    • Unlock and craft over 50 unique recipes.

    • Automate tasks to explore new professions and better serve your customers.

Graphics and Sound Design

  • Low-Poly Visual Style: A carefully crafted aesthetic for an authentic medieval experience.

  • Dynamic Lighting: The atmosphere evolves with the day-night cycle, adding a realistic touch to your tavern and the mysterious swamp surrounding it.

Features in Development

The game is in early access and will continue to grow with exciting new features, including:

  • Additional biomes and areas to explore.

  • More recipes and items to craft.

  • New interactions and quests with NPCs.

Dive into the world of Medieval StartUp and turn your humble tavern into a flourishing institution at the heart of the kingdom!

name: Medieval StartUp

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better, OpenGL Support required
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Medieval StartUp is a unique mix of tavern management, crafting, and exploration set in a rich medieval world. Manage your tavern, craft unique items, recruit staff, and explore a mysterious marsh full of hidden secrets and rare resources.
